title: We're All Lunatics /// Part 2 /// 172
description:
We're All Lunatics /// Part 2 /// 172

Part 2 of 2

www.TrueCrimeGarage.com

On April 26th, 2016 a 28 year old man went missing from the small town of Bourbon, Missouri. Edward Hillhouse was last seen leaving his sister's home. He was going to get some of his belongings he had stored at her home and take them to his new place. He never did. Edward was seen walking down the driveway toward the highway. He never returned to his sister's home. Tonight we discuss the case of a missing man in a small town that turned into a small town murder.

Beer of the Week - Cast Iron Oatmeal Brown by 4 Hands BrewingGarage Grade - 3 and 3 quarter bottle caps out of 5

Beer Fund: https://truecrimegarage.com/home
author: truecrimegarage@gmail.com (TRUE CRIME GARAGE)
